titleStmt.title: An Humble adoration to our Blessed Lord Iesus in the Holie Sacrament of his precious body.

notesStmt.note: Wing (2nd ed.) H3392B has title: An humble adoration of our Blessed Lord Jesus.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.

With: The most devovt prayers of S. Brigitte : touching the most holy passion of Ovr Saviovr Iesvs Christ. / Composed by the aforesayd saint, by instinct of the Holy Ghost. [Douai] : Printed at Dovvay by Balthazar Bellere, 1663.
